Blog.post: crying deflated searing pain there is no relief. existing in the shadows shame innocence torn shards of a beautiful soul adorn an anonymous path never to be made whole again.

I woke up The dream rang in my ears The pictures screamed The voices shimmered Then broke I can sense the fragrance of the forbidden night Taste the serenity within Images dance across my eyes Through my ears What is real?

My heart tentatively rejoices Hoping to feel the truth, taste the desire My spirit soars The world is mine I have conquered the smothering darkness I have arisen Carried forth upon triumphant wings The blackness is vanquished Every fibre of my very being cries out I rejoice My soul feels again.

The trials of many Decided by so few Manipulated by those whose hearts know nothing of loss Who want for nothing Yet are possessed of a hunger that can never be sated. Greedily grasping for the next conquest The next big crisis Hoping to reap the dividends Not heeding the rape of justice perpetrated By their very presence. Woe to the masses Whose voices go unrecorded Who scream until they are hoarse And finally can speak no more. The scales are permanently tipped Not in favour of the needy The sick The dying No. The golden statement determines right and wrong And from there what is left.

Sadly sifting through the shadows of my past My mind wanders Restless Searching I stumble over the remains of what was Once beautiful, whole. Captured in bold flashes of colour, indelibly etched A vision of happiness found Joy that was once celebrated. I extend myself Reach out The memory fades The blackness remains.

I crept along through the viscous night Avoiding the presence of other life Searching tirelessly for that shaft of truth. That which would illuminate my path and Cast asunder my trepidations Bringing me to that elusive inner peace. Yet the very thing that will set me free Escapes my every endeavour Evaporates with my approach. I am held in the throes of this vicious night There is no escape.

Devouring the pieces of exposed truths Knowing not what the outcome may be Ever drawn to the darkling dusk of a forever autumn Placidly accepting the cruel hand of fate Sinking finally into interminable stillness Never to drink again of the cup of May.
The scarlet dawn envelops the world You who are enlightened Cast off the shackles of drudgery Farewell the pessimist within Today you are free

The woven night paints a tapestry of memories Deepening darkness embraces my thoughts I feel you Your memory casts a shadow in the garden of my despair Illuminating the corners of my well of sorrow Yet you elude me I hear you The sweet melody of your being is in exquisite harmony Your truth cries out over all else I see you The faded portrait of your countenance Diminishes with each rising day Yet the deepest softest sleep brings you Into vivid clarity I need you The separation of our souls is as endless as the night You exist purely simply without me I am alone
